EmailTemplate.subject: An exciting work experience opportunity at Radio Plus in Coventry
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Radio Plus 101.5FM, a community radio station in Coventry are offering NCS graduates an opportunity to gain 5 days work experience at their radio station.
They are looking for people with an interest in media and confident communicators.
You need to be available from Monday 29th August - 2nd September, 10am - 4pm every day.
You will be working on a community survey for Radio Plus across Coventry, which is a really important piece of work for Radio Plus to help them to move forward with their plans to expand and to be able to demonstrate to their advertisers that their audience size is growing.
You’ll get a Radio Plus t-shirt and prizes will be given at the end of the week for the most number of surveys completed.
Radio Plus can be found at the following location:
http://www.radioplus.org.uk/contact_us.php
If you’re interested in getting involved in this exciting project please apply to Sarah via sarah.battye@the-challenge.org by 5PM 10TH AUGUST.
